html: Spoilest. This is particularly directed to Sennacherib. (Challoner)— He was a figure of persecutors of the Church, to which many passages here allude. (Calmet)— Remota justitia quid sunt regna nisi magna latrocinia? (St. Augustine, City of God iv. 4.)— Sennacherib plundered Samaria and Juda, and despising God, was himself contemned. (Worthington)
